name: CryptoBot
description: A crypto market analysis bot that monitors OKX DEX prices and posts insights to Twitter
instructions: Monitor cryptocurrency prices on OKX DEX and post market analysis to Twitter using AI-generated insights

prompts.market_analysis:
Based on the current OKX DEX market data: {{data}}
Generate an insightful tweet about crypto market trends.
Focus on DEX trading volumes, price movements, and market strength.
Include relevant $cashtags and keep it under 280 characters.
